sentences.en: She looked at him earnestly. "You don't mind?"
sentences.cn: 她诚挚地看着他说：“你不介意吧？”

sentences.en: She always listened earnestly as if this might help her to understand.
sentences.cn: 她总是认真地听，好像这样会帮她听懂一样。

sentences.en: "Take some more tea," the March Hare said to Alice, very earnestly.
sentences.cn: “再喝点茶吧。”三月兔很认真地对爱丽丝说。
